    • Method Detail

      • canMove

        public boolean canMove(char token,
              int i,
              int j)
        Determine whether specified player can move at position.
        Parameters:
        token - the token used by player we are evaluating
        i - row of position
        j - column of position
        Returns:
        true if token can be placed at i,j; false if not

      • canMove

        public boolean canMove(char token,
              java.lang.String theMove)
        Determine whether specified player can move at position.
        Parameters:
        token - the token used by player we are evaluating
        theMove - is a string with letter/number combination (e.g., c4)
        Returns:
        true if token can be placed at i,j; false if not

      • countPossibleMoves

        public int countPossibleMoves(char token,
                     boolean showMoves)
        Determine how many moves are available to given player.
        Parameters:
        token - the token used by player we are evaluating
        showMoves - lists moves as we find them if true; no output if false
        Returns:
        number of moves available to token

      • display

        public void display()
        Display the grid along with a key for aiding user input.

      • gameOver

        public boolean gameOver()
        Determine if game is over or not.
        Returns:
        true if board is full or no moves possible; false otherwise

      • makeMove

        public Move makeMove(char token,
            int i,
            int j)
        Attempt to make a move in the given position.
        Parameters:
        token - the token/piece to be placed on the grid if a good request.
        i - the row in which we are placing the piece
        j - the column in which we are placing the piece
        Returns:
        a Move object that contains details of the successful move; null if the move is not possible

        This method name is overloaded with various parameter options, all of which call this version of the method.

      • makeMove

        public Move makeMove(char token,
            java.lang.String theMove)
        Attempt to make a move in the given position.
        Parameters:
        token - the token/piece to be placed on the grid if a good request.
        theMove - is a string with letter/number combination (e.g., c4)
        Returns:
        a Move object that contains details of the successful move; null if the move is not possible

      • makeMove

        public Move makeMove(Move move)
        Attempt to make a move given a Move object.
        Parameters:
        move - a Move object containing the move to be made
        Returns:
        a Move object that contains details of the successful move; null if the move is not possible

      • showResults

        public void showResults()
        Display results of game (so far or at end of game).

      • translateMove

        public static java.lang.String translateMove(int i,
                             int j)
        Given row/col values turn into letter/number combination.
        Parameters:
        i - row of position
        j - column of position
        Returns:
        letter/number equivalent of position (i,j)

      • unMakeMove

        public void unMakeMove(Move move)
        Undo all captures and remove piece from a board.
        Parameters:
        move - a Move object containing the move to be unmade
